journals.title: A Moment of Stillness ❤️
journals.body:
Finding calm in the chaos....!

Today, I sat by my window with a cup of tea and just… breathed.
No goals. No screens. No deadlines. Just the soft sound of the wind brushing against the leaves and the distant hum of life.
It's incredible how peaceful the world can be when you simply let it be.

I want to remember this feeling. Stillness isn’t a luxury. It’s necessary.
journals.author: Divya

journals.title: 🌙Goodnight, Overthinking
journals.body:
My mind races at night. Replaying conversations. Imagining what-ifs. Planning futures.
But tonight, I write. Not to solve, but to release.

To the thoughts that served me — thank you.
To the ones that don’t — you can rest now.

Here's to choosing peace before sleep.
journals.author: Divya

journals.title: When Ideas Bloom🌿
journals.body:
Sometimes, ideas come rushing like a waterfall. Other times, they trickle in — slow, patient, and quiet.
I’ve learned to stop chasing the inspiration and start creating space for it.
A clean desk, a blank page, and a clear mind — that’s all I need.

The rest… unfolds on its own.
journals.author: Divyasai
